refnamediv.refpurpose: How to use the Asterisk Manager library.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: AsteriskManager provides the user with the ability to interface with their Asterisk PBX server via the built-in manager interface. This enables remote control and management from a PHP web application.
This will enable your PHP application to originate calls, monitor existing calls, query for status and much more.
